content: f r e e billy stocking stitch jumper knitting pattern in bobble peep dk gauge it is essential to work to the stated gauge in order to achieve your desired fabric and garment size you should always start by knitting a gauge square before knitting the full garment if you have fewer stitches than stated you will need to go down needle sizes until the correct gauge is achieved if you have more stitches you will need to go up needle sizes please check individual patterns for gauge before starting your garment finishing we recommend using mattress stitch for seaming your garment when sewing in the sleeve you will need to fold the sleeve in half and whilst matching the fold to the shoulder seam sew in position between the markers once your garment is complete it is essential to block your knitting pin your garment out to the size stated in the pattern cover with a damp cloth and leave to dry ddkk 4mm us6 gauge 112 122 50g 10cm/4″sq metres yards ball 22 sts 52% wool/wolle/lana/laine/ull/villa 48% nylon/polyamid/poliamida/polyamide/polyamid/polyamidi 3 swor 82 billy stocking stitch jumper knitting pattern in bobble peep dk abbreviations * repeat the instructions following the single asterisk as directed ** when prompted follow the instructions as directed up to the double asterisk or within the two sets of double asterisks work instructions within brackets as many times as directed work instructions within brackets for a specific size beg beginning cm centimetres cont continue decrease decrease ing g grams in inch es k knit kfb knit into front and back of stitch 1 st made k2tog knit 2 together 52% falkland wool 48% nylon m1 make 1 stitch by picking up loop between 4mm last and next stitch and work into the back us6 of this loop mm millimetres p purl psso pass slipped stitch over knit stitch reshape whilst damp p2tog purl 2 together do not tumble dry rem remain ing repeat repeat rh right hand rs right side sl1 slip 1 stitch st s stitch es st-st stocking stitch 1 row knit 1 row purl when working in row tbl through back loop decrease together ws wrong side billy stocking stitch jumper level yarn west yorkshire spinners bobble peep dk equipment tin man 305 08 one pair of 3 25mm uk10/us3 knitting needles one pair of 4mm uk8/us6 knitting needles two stitch holders tin man 305 stitch markers 2 2 3 3 3 4 x 50g 3 3 3 3 4 4 buttons gauge 22 sts and 28 row to 10cm measured over stocking stitch using 4mm needles or size measurements needed to achieve stated gauge to fit it is essential to work to the stated gauge to ensure success months 0 6 6 9 9 12 12 18 18 24 24 36 to fit chest cm 36 41 46 51 56 61 in 14 16 18 20 22 24 actual size cm 46 52 57 63 66 72 in 18 20½ 22½ 24¾
